title: ServiceNow Performance - CMDB Health
description: This dashboard provides insights into detailed analysis of the configuration items (CIs) within the CMDB, highlighting issues related to completeness, accuracy, and compliance as well as offers a visual summary of the overall health of the CMDB, presenting key metrics and trends to monitor and improve data quality.

definition.content:
CMDB Health in ServiceNow ensures the accuracy, completeness, and consistency of your Configuration Management Database (CMDB) to optimize IT operations and reduce risk.

This dashboard provides insights into detailed analysis of the configuration items (CIs) within the CMDB, highlighting issues related to completeness, accuracy, and compliance as well as offers a visual summary of the overall health of the CMDB, presenting key metrics and trends to monitor and improve data quality.

**Tips:**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

For more information, see the [ServiceNow Performance Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/servicenow_performance/).
